title: Sr. Software Engineer - Traffic, JVM Frameworks (ASE)
summary: Apple services make extensive use of Java Virtual Machine (JVM) and Java Development Kit (JDK) technology. Team members are passionate about working across a large organization to understand where library changes are justified.
description: As an experienced software engineer you will contribute to and build JVM based libraries that enable services at Apple’s scale.
key_qualifications: Expert knowledge of Java, Java API design and evolution, Understanding of concurrency and multi-threaded concepts, Proficient with networking and inter-process communication, Java Memory Model, JVM performance analysis, Partnering with application and library developers, Java Development Kit, Garbage Collection, JIT technologies.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200. Apple employees also have opportunities for stock programs, comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, tuition reimbursement, bonuses, commission payments, and relocation.
